text_block_list.text:
After training one day, unusually agitated sounds came 
from the direction of Sakura Bakushin O.
Nununu…!! Nunuhnuguhh……!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Could this be an ordeal… am I being tested!? Then confronting it 
is the only right thing to do as class president!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: However, howevererrere!!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Oh, trainer! I am in fact talking about a queue!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
You see, there is this cake I'd like to buy, but it is an item of 
some popularity, and I would be forced to stand in a long queue—
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
I sooo very much dislike standing in line, and so I was 
racking my brain about what to do…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Guh… should I push myself to stand in that queue, 
or follow my heart and refrain…!! Nrmgblgg～!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
She does seem like the type who couldn't stand still for long. 
Perhaps it would help her to have someone to talk to.

Ho now, are you interested in this cake too, trainer? 
Then there's no time to be worrying about queues!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
I remember my parents say "A companion in travels, 
compassion in life!" Not that I know what that means!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
If you will come with me, trainer, then let us go 
together on our next day off!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
On said day off, I accompanied Sakura Bakushin O 
to the cake store. However—
Huuh… Hoah…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
One sparrow, two sparrows…!! 
Three pigeons, and one excellent class president……!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Hold up!! Where's my trainer!? I'm certain he came with me!! 
How many trainers are…!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: I'm standing next to you, relax.

text_block_list.text:
Well, well, well!? You were closer than I thought! 
It is a relief to hear!! Pheeew…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
—We've been in line for a minute. 
I don't know if it's the effect queues have on her, but 
she's clearly not dealing with it well.
…I have to distract her with something.
choice_data_list: What kind of cake is it anyway?
What kind of cake is it anyway?

text_block_list.text:
Ooh! 
I'm glad you asked!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
This store calls what they're selling 
"History's Fastest Star Cheesecake"!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
When "History's Fastest" is in its name, surely eating it will 
help me become history's fastest as well! Wouldn't you think!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
By all means, I must eat it! My class president blood 
demands it! As everyone's role model, I must become 
the fastest horsegirl in all of history!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
She seems to think that the cheesecake 
is supposed to make her faster…

But at the other end of the line, at the entrance to the shop, 
stood a board. Taking a closer look at it, 
I think she missed the "-selling" part after "Fastest"…

Now now, don't joke around trainer! 
You can't fool me that easily!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
But what do you think "History's Fastest 
Star Cheesecake" looks like?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Maybe it's based on the Shinkansen? Or an airplane? 
Or… wait!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
What if they've heard of my exploits, and modeled it after me…! 
…Hehehe! Now, now, you can't do that without permission…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Time steadily passed as our silly chats continued—

… and so, I safely delivered the puppy 
that wandered onto the premises to its owner!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Hehen! Swift actions and problem solving make the class president! 
If you have any issues of your own, trainer, don't hesitate to—
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Just a moment please, the shop is filled!
text_block_list.name: Cake shop employee

text_block_list.text:
Oho!? We're standing at the entrance!? 
How could this be…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Is this a miracle…!? A gift from the heavens bestowed 
upon the chosen class president…!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: A little chat makes time go by quick.
A little chat makes time go by quick.

text_block_list.text:
Verily, I was so absorbed in our chat that 
I didn't notice the line move!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Trainer, did you keep chatting with me for exactly that reason?!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
I'm simply amazed… to come this far without realizing…! 
Trainer, you're a genius!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: This is what I can do…!
This is what I can do…!

text_block_list.text:
Indeed! 
A brilliant, well-calculated strategy!! Truly dependable!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
If I am the heavens' chosen class president, 
then you must be the gods' chosen trainer!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
The chosen class president and the chosen trainer… 
If this can't be called fate, then what can…!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Wewha!? 
I've lost track of time once again…!?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Anytheways, let us acquire some cheesecake!!… Forwards!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
We bought the cheesecake without further incident and 
enjoyed a taste upon returning to the academy. But then—

That was great! Now let's go time a run!! 
I must know if I've become "History's Fastest"!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: One, two, bakushiiiiin!!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text: Haa… hah… haah……
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Trainer…! 
I could feel it…!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
You don't have to tell me anything! 
I know I've just become "History's Fastest"…!!!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Looking at the stopwatch in my hand, I see that her time 
is right around her usual…
choice_data_list: <size=39>Nice start! But your time hasn't changed…</size>
<size=39>Nice start! But your time hasn't changed…</size>

text_block_list.text:
Huwha!? That can't be ri- 
…Ah, I know!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
It must be because I ran right after eating! 
We'll have to try again later!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Whew～ …it's been a good day all the same. I've gotten my hands on 
the fastest cake, and overcame the queues!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Although I only overcame them because you were with me! 
A class president must give credit where due!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
So I'll be counting on you next time I'm forced 
to stand in a queue, trainer!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O looked satisfied, but her time 
never ended up changing…
